participant_1.background:
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I am a YouTuber who creates content for my audience.
i live in new york city.
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

participant_2.background:
I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I'm not too concerned with social media, I'd rather focus on my writing.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.
I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
Hey! It's going good. How about yourself?
It's going well, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to write, and I also like to work on home improvement projects.
That's awesome! I like to write as well. What kind of things do you like to write about?
I write short stories and poems, mostly. I also like to write scripts for short films.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to try writing scripts.
It's a lot of fun! It's definitely challenging, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem!
So, what kind of home improvement projects do you like to work on?
I like to do a lot of different things, but my favorite thing to do is build things. I built a new deck on my house last summer, and I'm really proud of it.
That's awesome! I bet it looks great.
Thanks! It does. I'm really happy with how it turned out.
I'm sure your family and friends love it too.
They do! They all think it's great.
That's wonderful!
Thanks!
